translations: n．优势，有利条件：一个有利的位置或处境，使人在竞争中具有优势。

sentences.sentence: Rubber poly v-belt is the new type transmission belt with a lot of ad-vantages.
sentences.translation: 多楔带作为一种新型的传动带，具有许多优点。

sentences.sentence: This article introduced strucre, ad- vantages, new technology and use of helmet head up display.
sentences.translation: 本文介绍了头盔平视显示器的结构、特点、新技术和应用。

sentences.sentence: The application examples given in the end of this paper show that the grey measure formula has obvious ad- vantages.
sentences.translation: 实际应用表明，这种建立在GM（1，N）基础上的集约度与粗放度的灰测度公式，有明显的优点。
